title: Apollo VS Cronus

replies.body:
it's minecraft it looks better with less editting and more clean gameplay maybe a bit of motion blur, very occasional slow down.
This looks like an attempt at a montage parody

Disagree with both of you
You added cool effects, video looks good other than way too many zooms w/ pan & crop. Also, try to make the drop have specialities that the rest of the clip doesnt.
